alert.note: Alert for North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 11 at 3:24AM MST until January 12 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THIS EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph possible. Ares of blowing snow also expected. * WHERE...North Snowy Range Foothills. * WHEN...From this evening through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. Areas of blowing snow may result in localized areas of significantly reduced visibilities at times, along with slick road conditions.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
